channel.title: Custer County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Custer County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-75 South - Salmon River Scenic Byway
item.description: ID-75 South - Salmon River Scenic Byway in Custer County.

item.title: US-93 South at ID-75
item.description: US-93 South at ID-75 in Custer County

item.title: US-93 South at ID-75
item.description: US-93 South at ID-75 in Custer County. Turn right for ID-75 south to Stanley and Sun Valley. Continue south on US-93 for Arco.

item.title: US-93 South - Custer County/Pahsimeroi River
item.description: US-93 South Entering Custer County at the Pahsimeroi River

item.title: End ID-75 North at US-93
item.description: End ID-75 at US-93. Turn left for US-93 north to Challis and Salmon. Turn right for US-93 south to Arco. US-93 north is part of the Salmon River Scenic Byway; US-93 south is part of the Peaks to Craters Scenic Byway.

item.title: ID-75 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-75 north. Distance to Challis, Salmon, and Missoula (Montana).

item.title: ID-75 North - Custer County
item.description: ID-75 north, just north of Clayton. The Salmon River is in the background.

item.title: ID-75 North - Custer County
item.description: ID-75 North in Custer County. The Salmon River is in the background of the picture. There are quite a few of the new style state highway shields on ID-75 northbound between Stanley and Challis.

item.title: End ID-21 East at ID-75
item.description: End ID-21 East at ID-75. Use ID-75 south for Sun Valley. Use ID-75 north for Lower Stanley and Salmon.

item.title: US-93 North - Mackay
item.description: Entering Mackay on US-93 north.

item.title: US-93 North - No Gas Next 57 Miles
item.description: US-93 North - No Gas/Diesel Next 57 Miles (in Salmon). Taken on the north end of Challis.

item.title: US-93 South - Peaks To Craters Scenic Byway
item.description: US-93 South - Peaks To Craters Scenic Byway in Custer County.

item.title: End ID-75 North at US-93
item.description: End ID-75 at US-93. Turn left for US-93 north to Challis and Salmon. Turn right for US-93 south to Arco. US-93 north is part of the Salmon River Scenic Byway; US-93 south is part of the Peaks to Craters Scenic Byway.

item.title: End ID-75 North at US-93
item.description: End ID-75 North at US-93 in Custer County.

item.title: ID-75 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-75 north. Distance to Challis, Salmon, and Missoula (Montana). The Salmon River is in the background.

item.title: ID-75 North - Entering Clayton
item.description: Entering Clayton on ID-75 North. Clayton has a population of 7, making it the second smallest city in the state behind Warm River.

item.title: End ID-21 East at ID-75
item.description: End ID-21 East at ID-75 in Stanley.

item.title: ID-21 East - Entering Stanley
item.description: Entering Stanley on ID-21 East - Population 63. Speed Limit 35 MPH.

item.title: ID-21 North - Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway
item.description: ID-21 North - Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway. The Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway runs along ID-21 between Boise and Stanley.

item.title: ID-21 - Truck Restrictions
item.description: Truck restrictions on ID-21 between Lowman and Idaho City.

item.title: ID-75 North at ID-21 South
item.description: ID-75 North at ID-21 South. Use ID-75 north for Lower Stanley and Salmon. Use ID-21 south for Boise. The Salmon River can be seen in the background of the picture.

item.title: ID-75 North at ID-21 South
item.description: ID-21 Junction on ID-75 North in Stanley.

item.title: ID-75 North Approaching ID-21
item.description: Approaching ID-21 Junction on ID-75 North in Stanley. Milemarker 189.

item.title: ID-75 North - Obsidian
item.description: Entering the community of Obsidian on ID-75 north.

item.title: ID-75 North - Entering Custer County
item.description: Entering Custer County on ID-75 north at the Salmon River.

item.title: End ID-21 East at ID-75
item.description: End ID-21 East at ID-75. Use ID-75 south for Sun Valley. Use ID-75 north for Lower Stanley and Salmon.

item.title: ID-21 East Approaching ID-75
item.description: ID-21 East approaching ID-75 in Stanley. ID-21 east ends here,

item.title: ID-21 West - Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway
item.description: Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway on ID-21 west. The Ponderosa Pine Scenic Byway starts here in Stanley and follows ID-21 west to Boise.

item.title: ID-75 North - Salmon River Scenic Byway
item.description: Salmon River Scenic Byway on ID-75 north. The Salmon River Scenic Byway starts here in Stanley and follows ID-75 north to Challis. Then the byway follows US-93 north to the Montana line.

item.description: Approaching ID-21 Junction on ID-75 North in Stanley.

item.description: ID-21 Junction on ID-75 North in Stanley.

item.title: ID-75 North at ID-21 South
item.description: ID-21/ID-75 Junction to Salmon and Boise, on ID-75 North in Stanley.

item.title: ID-75 South - Sawtooth Scenic Byway
item.description: Sawtooth Scenic Byway on ID-75 south. The Sawtooth Scenic Byway starts here in Stanley and follows ID-75 south to Shoshone. The peaks of the Sawtooth Range are in the background.

item.title: ID-75 East of Stanley
item.description: ID-75 East - Custer County.
